results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 05
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around receiving visitors at home and the time, the calendar and seasons of the year. Demonstrative pronouns and adjectives are dealt with in this lesson.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 03
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around the home and the limbs and parts of the body. Grammar refers to negatives, and personal and possessive pronouns.

results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 02
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. results.title: Le Francais par le film. No. 01
results.brief_description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of french life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This first episode is an introduction to the characters - a French family. Stresses pronunciation of certain French vowels and consonants.

results.title: First aid training in personnel damage control. No. 4. Fractures
results.creator_credit: United States. Dept. of the Navy and Wilding Picture Productions
results.brief_description: In this film, instructions are given to sailors on how to give first aid for fractured bones. Animation is used to describe the human skeletal system, the effects of fractures on muscle, blood vessels, skin, and nerves, to illustrate the difference between simple and compound fractures, and to illustrate the effects of a Thomas splint.
results.title_for_label: First aid training in personnel damage control. No. 4. Fractures

results.title: Fra Diavolo
results.creator_credit: Francesco Cancellieri, George Richfield, Official Films and Richfield Operatic Films
results.brief_description: A condensed version of Aubor’s comic opera in three acts. The film preserves the dramatic continuity of the complete opera and includes the major scenes and musical passages. Photographed on the stage of the opera house of Rome, sung in Italian by La Scala Opera Company with Nino Adami in the role of Fra Diavolo.

results.title: Four ways to drama (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Norman G. Dyhrenfurth and University of California. Dept. of Theatre Arts. Motion Picture Division
results.brief_description: Presents four versions of a short dramatic episode - stage, radio, television and motion pictures - using the same plot and character to illustrate and compare the requirements of each medium.

results.title: The Four seasons of Japan
results.brief_description: Japanese countryside seen during the four seasons of the year. Eaqch season is marked by definite changes in the appearance of the landscape and foliage and each is celebrated by an appropriate festival.Shows changes in everyday life, sports and customs, and in nature, through each season.
